- Enhanced coach search service with bank account verification

Frontend changes:
- Merged enhanced UI/UX improvements and notifications
- Combined mobile responsiveness enhancements
- Integrated localStorage fallback for saved coaches
- Merged improved error handling and user feedback
- Combined notification systems with badges and real-time updates
- Merged enhanced analytics dashboard with mobile-optimized design
- Integrated collapsible sidebar with hover tooltips
- Combined form state management improvements
- Merged payout request and billing management components
